headline: S&P Global Launches WSO Compliance Insights to Streamline Credit Risk Management
summary: S&P Global (NYSE: SPGI) today announced the launch of WSO Compliance Insights, a comprehensive compliance management solution designed to enhance credit risk management for private credit and CLO managers. This application, available through S&P Global Market Intelligence, utilizes real-time data streaming, enabling users to streamline compliance processes, eliminate end-of-day batch processing and improve decision-making capabilities.
